content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. I have a 25 square meter apartment available for rent. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 Euros. But I am open to negotiation. I am a student and I want to be responsible and dependable. I want to have a good relationship with my landlord.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Understood, Hassan. I would be happy to work with you to find a rental price that fits your budget and meets your needs. Is there a specific duration for which you are looking to rent the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a minimum of 6 months. I am open to a longer duration as well.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I can offer you a rental price of 550 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price is based on the current market rates in Mannheim and takes into account the duration of your lease. I am confident that this price is fair and reasonable, and I believe it is within your budget. Would you agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
